entry.title: Boris Johnson: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)

media:group.media:title: Boris Johnson: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)
media:group.media:description:
John Oliver explains how Britain’s new prime minister, Boris Johnson, has succeeded – not despite his bumbling persona, but often because of it.

media:group.media:title: Chiitan: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)
media:group.media:description:
